storyInfo: In search of a place where she can truly be happy, Caper arrives in Dossoles only to find that the word 'happiness' has a whole different meaning in this so-called 'City of Pleasure'.

attributes.content: I've done this 'Wobbly Champagne Flute' ten times, and I didn't throw up!
attributes.name: Dizzy Tourist

attributes.content: I did the 'Shaking Overalls' twenty times! I didn't throw up, either!
attributes.name: Lightheaded Tourist

attributes.content: Okay, okay. Hand me all your raffle tickets.
attributes.name: Caper

attributes.content: Let's see... ten 'Wobbly Champagne Flute' runs, twenty 'Shaking Overalls' runs. You get three draws.
attributes.name: Caper

attributes.content: Alright, let's do the draws now. Goood luuuck.
attributes.name: Caper

attributes.content: If I win the grand prize, I'm buying that two-story house across the street. That way, I can hit the casinos every day just coming downstairs.
attributes.name: Dizzy Tourist

attributes.content: Fourth prize isn't so bad either. That's the newest yacht from Box Inc.! I could at least pay off the protection money I owe the Snaptooths.
attributes.name: Dizzy Tourist

attributes.content: I put my mother's store up as collateral! And I'm still short some money!
attributes.name: Dizzy Tourist

attributes.content: I don't even care what we end up getting as long as it's not another 'Thanks for playing!'
attributes.name: Lightheaded Tourist

attributes.content: As long as I win something... All this spinning and holding back my urge to barf... will be worth it...
attributes.name: Lightheaded Tourist

attributes.content: There! Let's see what we got!
attributes.name: Dizzy Tourist

attributes.content: Hold up. I'm still kinda dizzy... Can't see very well...
attributes.name: Lightheaded Tourist

attributes.content: Whoa! Super! You two are real lucky, you know that?
attributes.name: Caper

attributes.content: Felicitaciones! Today's special grand prize! Tickets for 'Another 100 Tries'!
attributes.name: Caper

attributes.content: Today's special grand prize? 'Another 100 Tries'?! So I get 100 more draws? Awesome!
attributes.name: Dizzy Tourist

attributes.content: No, no, no. That wouldn't be much fun at all...
attributes.name: Caper

attributes.content: Hah, anyway, these are my tickets!
attributes.name: Lightheaded Tourist

attributes.content: In your dreams! I did all the hard work here!
attributes.name: Dizzy Tourist

attributes.content: Okay, okay. Calm down.
attributes.name: Caper

attributes.content: 'Another 100 Tries' means you get to try 'Wobbly Champagne Flute' and 'Shaking Overalls' another hundred times!
attributes.name: Caper

attributes.content: A total of hundred times more for the two of you! That's plenty of fun for everybody!
attributes.name: Caper

attributes.content: What?! Bluggh—
attributes.name: Dizzy & Lightheaded Tourists

attributes.content: Ugh. Dodged that just in time. Almost got that puke all over me...
attributes.name: Caper

attributes.content: Sorry about knocking you out so long, señora receptionist. Here's your uniform, good as new! Now, time for a shift change!
attributes.name: Caper

attributes.content: Doesn't look like those two liked the special grand prize, though. Aren't they here to have fun?
attributes.name: Caper

attributes.content: They could've had so much fun for no money at all. What a couple of weirdos...
attributes.name: Caper

attributes.content: Hello, there, I'd like a 'Double Sunrise'.
Save it, Pelirrojo. I don't remember coming up with a lame password like that.
attributes.name: Caper

attributes.content: Well, actually, I really want to give that drink a try. The guys here with their pockets full of protection money all love it. Is it really that good?
attributes.name: Pelirrojo

attributes.content: I'm off work, if you know what I mean. Wait till this señora here wakes up, if you want one.
attributes.name: Caper

attributes.content: Alright, forget that... I've got some info, seriously. Let's find a place where we can talk.
attributes.name: Pelirrojo

attributes.content: What's the word? You manage to dig up any dirt on the protection racketeers?
attributes.name: Caper

attributes.content: Yeah, I followed a couple of them and found their hideout... Took me longer than I thought.
attributes.name: Pelirrojo

attributes.content: Turns out the biggest gang in the barrio, the Snaptooths, are behind the protection racket.
attributes.name: Pelirrojo

attributes.content: So, if we want to chase them out of the casinos here, we'll make an enemy of the entire gang?
attributes.name: Caper

attributes.content: More precisely, if we want to stay in town, we'll have to follow their rules.
attributes.name: Pelirrojo

attributes.content: Heh, perfect. I love breaking rules.
attributes.name: Caper

attributes.content: Carlie... let's just mind our own business.
attributes.name: Pelirrojo

attributes.content: We can keep having fun here, even if they keep collecting protection money, right?
attributes.name: Pelirrojo

attributes.content: As long as they aren't taking our money, we don't really have to drive them out.
attributes.name: Pelirrojo

attributes.content: No, we're doing this.
attributes.name: Caper

attributes.content: Look, I told you before.
attributes.name: Caper

attributes.content: I came to Dossoles to find a place where I can really be happy.
attributes.name: Caper

attributes.content: Yeah, it's fun hitting the casinos, but it bothers me to see these pendejos ruining the fun here.
attributes.name: Caper

attributes.content: I can't stand them threatening people, just trying to profit off them.
attributes.name: Caper

attributes.content: Yeah, I can't agree more!
attributes.name: Pelirrojo

attributes.content: If I were their boss, I wouldn't let my boys do anything like this!
attributes.name: Pelirrojo

attributes.content: Huh? Really?
attributes.name: Caper

attributes.content: Let's go take their bossman down, then!
attributes.name: Caper

attributes.content: I know! Who cares if he's a veteran or working for the mayor? Just gotta beat them till they give up, right?
attributes.name: Pelirrojo

attributes.content: Ay, why are you always so reckless? Try to use your head for once, alright?
attributes.name: Caper

attributes.content: I've met the guy. I'd even put all the honors I earned in the army on the line. One-on-one, I could take him down easy.
attributes.name: Pelirrojo

attributes.content: All thanks to you signing me up for the service, way back when.
attributes.name: Pelirrojo

attributes.content: (Murmurs) But if he's actually working for the mayor, even if you took him down, how can you be sure no one's gonna come looking for trouble later?
attributes.name: Caper

attributes.content: What?
attributes.name: Pelirrojo

attributes.content: Never mind... And here I thought you were still mad at me.
attributes.name: Caper

attributes.content: If I didn't trick you into hopping on that army recruiting bus, you probably could've spent a couple more years running those barrios.
attributes.name: Caper

attributes.content: Heh, I thought it through, and I don't blame you. If I hadn't gotten on that bus, I probably never would've made it to Dossoles.
attributes.name: Pelirrojo

attributes.content: If I hadn't gotten on that bus... I probably would've ended up wasting my whole life away as a slum gang boss.
attributes.name: Pelirrojo

attributes.content: What's so bad about slums? I wish I was still living there.
attributes.name: Caper

attributes.content: If it wasn't for...
attributes.name: Caper

attributes.content: Caper can feel the Originium crystal under her red gloves.
She thought she had gotten used to it, but every now and then, she finds herself unable to ignore it.
Never mind... Not like we have a choice.
attributes.name: Caper

attributes.content: Carajo! Who did that?!
attributes.name: Arrogant Youth

attributes.content: Hm? Did you kick that can at me, chica?
attributes.name: Arrogant Youth

attributes.content: Yep, that was me.
attributes.name: Caper

attributes.content: You just shook down the old balloon parlor, didn't you?
attributes.name: Caper

attributes.content: How is that any of your business? I—
attributes.name: Arrogant Youth

attributes.content: Let's not waste time on this guy, Carlie.
attributes.name: Pelirrojo

attributes.content: Whoa, that's a mean punch.
attributes.name: Caper

attributes.content: What are you doing, Pelirrojo?
attributes.name: Caper

attributes.content: Why are you going through his pockets?
attributes.name: Caper

attributes.content: Why else? I'm taking back all the money he stole from the old man.
attributes.name: Pelirrojo

attributes.content: Oh, then you gotta give it back to him.
attributes.name: Caper

attributes.content: Give it back?
attributes.name: Pelirrojo

attributes.content: It's not all from the old man, you know?
attributes.name: Pelirrojo

attributes.content: Alright, fine. Don't look at me like that. I'll buy a couple balloons from him. That'll work for you?
attributes.name: Pelirrojo

attributes.content: Let's split up here. I got other business.
attributes.name: Pelirrojo

attributes.content: Alright, do what you gotta do.
attributes.name: Caper

attributes.content: Where did Pelirrojo go...? I haven't seen him all day.
attributes.name: Caper

attributes.content: He did give the money back to the old man, didn't he?
attributes.name: Caper

attributes.content: Never mind... Better leave him be.
attributes.name: Caper

attributes.content: Carlie...
attributes.name: Pelirrojo

attributes.content: Whoa!
attributes.name: Caper

attributes.content: What are you doing, squatting here? What's with the empty beer cans...? How much have you been drinking?
attributes.name: Caper

attributes.content: Hahaha, yeah, I have no idea myself...
attributes.name: Pelirrojo

attributes.content: Did you know? Back in the slums... my papa had to shine twenty pairs of shoes before he'd buy himself a can of beer.
attributes.name: Pelirrojo

attributes.content: What happened to you?
attributes.name: Caper

attributes.content: What happened? Hah, you know what kind of things happen to people in Dossoles...
attributes.name: Pelirrojo

attributes.content: Carlie... You saw it, right? I knocked out a street thug with a single punch today.
attributes.name: Pelirrojo

attributes.content: The protection money he got... was enough for this much beer...
attributes.name: Pelirrojo

attributes.content: Pelirrojo...
attributes.name: Caper

attributes.content: That wasn't our money to take.
attributes.name: Caper

attributes.content: Heh, I mean, that's true, but... having all the money we could ever spend, isn't that the happiness we're chasing?
attributes.name: Pelirrojo

attributes.content: Carlie, once we take down the Snaptooth boss, let's take this barrio for ourselves. The two of us!
attributes.name: Pelirrojo

attributes.content: We can collect protection, too. We'll have more money than we could ever spend...
attributes.name: Pelirrojo

attributes.content: Then, I'll buy my old man a new house, right by the pub! He'll get to drink till he drops!
attributes.name: Pelirrojo

attributes.content: You could bring your mamá here, too. We'll run a big factory! Hah, it'll be glorious!
attributes.name: Pelirrojo

attributes.content: No, this isn't right...
attributes.name: Caper

attributes.content: Where am I...?
attributes.name: Caper

attributes.content: I'm home? ... Where's Mamá?
attributes.name: Caper

attributes.content: I'm here, Carlie.
attributes.name: Mother

attributes.content: Phew... Mamá, I really miss you...
attributes.name: Caper

attributes.content: How have you been? Did those bad guys come back again for protection money?
attributes.name: Caper

attributes.content: I'm so sorry I never write you...
attributes.name: Caper

attributes.content: I've been looking for a place we can really be happy... to live a happy life together...
attributes.name: Caper

attributes.content: A place where no one wants me gone, and no one wrecks your workroom...
attributes.name: Caper

attributes.content: A place where I won't be a burden to you even if I caught Oripathy...
attributes.name: Caper

attributes.content: But I still haven't found that place.
attributes.name: Caper

attributes.content: It's okay, Carlie.
attributes.name: Mother

attributes.content: I'll get you treated, even if I have to spend all my savings.
attributes.name: Mother

attributes.content: No, Mamá, don't say that...
attributes.name: Caper

attributes.content: I just want you to be happy.
attributes.name: Mother

attributes.content: Don't say that...
attributes.name: Caper

attributes.content: I'd rather you be happy.
attributes.name: Caper

attributes.content: The next day...
That's way too pushy. Where did you learn to write?
attributes.name: Caper

attributes.content: Try something like this. Start with, like 'To The Most Honorable Gang Boss,'
attributes.name: Caper

attributes.content: No... your handwriting's terrible. Do it over!
attributes.name: Caper

attributes.content: Alright...
attributes.name: Pelirrojo

attributes.content: Bueno. Now, add the time and date.
attributes.name: Caper

attributes.content: 'Next Friday, 7 PM, at your hideout.'
attributes.name: Caper

attributes.content: Okay, I know what to put after that.
attributes.name: Pelirrojo

attributes.content: 'Be ready. We'll fight, one-on-one.'
attributes.name: Pelirrojo

attributes.content: Do it over. Now, at the very end—'Would you perhaps have time for a one-on-one meeting?'
attributes.name: Caper

attributes.content: Fine...
attributes.name: Pelirrojo

attributes.content: I don't get it. We're challenging him to a fight. Do we have to be so polite?
attributes.name: Pelirrojo

attributes.content: We're making it sound like we're afraid of him.
attributes.name: Pelirrojo

attributes.content: If he actually thinks we're scared of him, that'll make it even more fun.
attributes.name: Caper

attributes.content: Alright, whatever you say.
attributes.name: Pelirrojo

attributes.content: When the time comes...
attributes.name: Pelirrojo

attributes.content: When the time comes, I'll make a little commotion in the casino.
attributes.name: Caper

attributes.content: That'll get all their guys over there, and while their hideout's all empty and undefended, you go find el jefe.
attributes.name: Caper

attributes.content: You're sure you can take him?
attributes.name: Caper

attributes.content: Of course!
attributes.name: Pelirrojo

attributes.content: I got my weapon primed and ready for a while now. Heh, I tell you, it's a real treasure.
attributes.name: Pelirrojo

attributes.content: When we're done, we'll be the Snaptooths' new bosses, and we'll run the casinos in this town... Maybe, we'll even end up running all Dossoles!
attributes.name: Pelirrojo

attributes.content: Dream big, huh?
attributes.name: Caper

attributes.content: What if this is a trick of mine, again?
attributes.name: Caper

attributes.content: Honestly... When I ran into you, I really was thinking about beating a taste of all my army trouble into you.
attributes.name: Pelirrojo

attributes.content: But I thought it through. You're a lot smarter than me, and we've known each other a long time... Better make you a friend than an enemy.
attributes.name: Pelirrojo

attributes.content: And now I'm sure of it, Carlie. I made the right choice sticking with you.
attributes.name: Pelirrojo

attributes.content: Hmph. Save it for when this is all over.
attributes.name: Caper

attributes.content: Don't mess anything up.
attributes.name: Caper

attributes.content: Ugh... Get him started and he just keeps rambling on and on. Did his mamá never teach him to go to bed before ten?
attributes.name: Caper

attributes.content: And he's too confident about our plan. How does he sleep that soundly?
attributes.name: Caper

attributes.content: If we go with the first plan, he'll never become the gang boss.
attributes.name: Caper

attributes.content: No, actually, he probably won't even make it out of the hideout alive.
attributes.name: Caper

attributes.content: Never mind... The letter's already sent... If we're gonna make a ruckus, might as well make it a big one.
attributes.name: Caper

attributes.content: It's a perfect opportunity to show everyone in Dossoles what real fun is.
attributes.name: Caper

attributes.content: Let's see... The weapon he's bringing with him... Should be around here, right?
attributes.name: Caper

attributes.content: Haha, perfecto. This is gonna be so much more fun!
attributes.name: Caper

attributes.content: Right, I gotta book us a good spot.
attributes.name: Caper

attributes.content: Hola, is this the Sirus Rooftop Restaurant?
attributes.name: Caper

attributes.content: My tickets! Where are my tickets?!
attributes.name: Dizzy Tourist

attributes.content: I finished twenty 'Wobbly Champagne Flute' runs for them! Somebody stole my tickets!
attributes.name: Dizzy Tourist

attributes.content: My bag! My bag! What is it doing hanging from the chandelier?!
attributes.name: Frantic Tourist

attributes.content: What the... Who poured popcorn butter all over the ground?! These are signed, limited edition sneakers! You people better pay for this!
attributes.name: Frenzied Tourist

attributes.content: Please, everyone, stay calm!
attributes.name: Security Guard

attributes.content: There are intruders in the casino. Please stay calm and follow our instructions to evacuate!
attributes.name: Security Guard

attributes.content: (Woman's Voice) Ta-da! Buenas tardes, everyone. Please follow the safety instructions and proceed to the entrance plaza. We've prepared a little gift for everybody.
attributes.name: PA Announcement

attributes.content: (Woman's Voice) Make sure you have your sunglasses, watches, high heels, and all your belongings with you. If you leave anything in—
attributes.name: PA Announcement

attributes.content: (Man's Voice) Hey! How'd you get in—
attributes.name: PA Announcement

attributes.content: *whack*
attributes.name: PA Announcement

attributes.content: (Woman's Voice) Ahem, anyway, enjoy your evening!
attributes.name: PA Announcement

attributes.content: A gift? I wonder what that's about.
attributes.name: Dizzy Tourist

attributes.content: No idea, but let's go check it out!
attributes.name: Frantic Tourist

attributes.content: Hey, are you blind?! Don't step on my shoes!
attributes.name: Frenzied Tourist

attributes.content: C'mon, let's not just stand around. Go out and get yourselves a good spot for the show!
attributes.name: Caper

attributes.content: (Whistles)
attributes.name: Caper

attributes.content: Okay... It's my turn now.
attributes.name: Pelirrojo

attributes.content: It's been hours already. Where's our gift?
attributes.name: Frantic Tourist

attributes.content: Dammit, where is the staff? Why are they keeping us waiting out here?
attributes.name: Frenzied Tourist

attributes.content: Yes, I followed one of them out here, but it's so crowded, I can't find her now!
attributes.name: Security Guard

attributes.content: Yeah, yeah... What?
attributes.name: Security Guard

attributes.content: There's a situation over at el jefe's?!
attributes.name: Security Guard

attributes.content: Damnit...
attributes.name: Security Guard

attributes.content: Oh, don't be so impatient. It's almost time.
attributes.name: Caper

attributes.content: Yep... Cinco, cuatro, tres, dos, uno. It's showtime!
attributes.name: Caper

attributes.content: So you're the cabrón who smashed the truck in here?
attributes.name: Snaptooth Boss

attributes.content: A truck has bored into the Snaptooth hideout. Its rear is still sticking out of the building.
It's quite an impressive entrance, Pelirrojo thinks to himself.
Hmph, a broken wall. Now we have even more to worry about than our leaky ceiling, huh?
attributes.name: Snaptooth Boss

attributes.content: So what do you want? You wrecked my reception room. You better have an explanation for this.
attributes.name: Snaptooth Boss

attributes.content: (What the heck?!)
attributes.name: Pelirrojo

attributes.content: (Didn't we agree on a one-on-one fight? Why are there so many guys here?!)
attributes.name: Pelirrojo

attributes.content: What's this about?
attributes.name: Snaptooth Boss

attributes.content: Uh, umm...
attributes.name: Pelirrojo

attributes.content: (Screw it...)
attributes.name: Pelirrojo

attributes.content: Pelirrojo quietly opens the truck's rear compartment.
On the battlefield, this Originium cannon—which he got from one of his old pals in the military—has blown many enemies to pieces.
There's no doubt it is a formidable weapon.
One man... or a whole bunch... Makes no difference.
attributes.name: Pelirrojo

attributes.content: He remembers what Caper told him.

attributes.text: 'Try not to talk. Keep a mysterious vibe. Then, give them a real surprise.'

attributes.content: At the time, he didn't understand why Caper spoke of his formidable weapon like it was a piece of candy.
With the compartment open, he rubs his eyes, thinking he is seeing things.
Coño!
attributes.name: Pelirrojo

attributes.content: He finally gets it.
The Originium cannon that was supposed to be there is nowhere to be seen. Instead, some colorful cardboard boxes sit quietly in its place.
There are cartoon drawings on the boxes, and the sealing tapes are labeled 'Fun Times'.
He also sees a timer and a lit fuse. What's even worse is that the fuse has only mere centimeters left...
One after another, bursts of fireworks surge to the sky and bloom radiantly.
Some are shaped like flowers, some hearts, and some fowlbeasts... In an instant, the night sky over Dossoles is lit up with different colors.
Hah, what do you think? Beautiful, no?
attributes.name: Caper

attributes.content: It took a lot of work to put together a fireworks show this great!
attributes.name: Caper

attributes.content: What? That's our gift? And what the heck, it's so loud!
attributes.name: Lightheaded Tourist

attributes.content: Yeah, way too loud...
attributes.name: Dizzy Tourist

attributes.content: Come on, don't say that. The fireworks are beautiful. It's a shame there are so many buildings here blocking our view, though.
attributes.name: Frantic Tourist

attributes.content: They really should've given us a heads-up and arranged for a better view.
attributes.name: Frantic Tourist

attributes.content: Ah, whatever. This is lame. Can we go back inside?
attributes.name: Lightheaded Tourist

attributes.content: I really don't get these Dossoleans.
attributes.name: Caper

attributes.content: All they have to do is look up to enjoy the fireworks... Isn't that good enough?
attributes.name: Caper

attributes.content: Back in the slums, every time they had a fireworks show in the city, Mamá and I would watch together... That was a happiness even people like us got to share.
attributes.name: Caper

attributes.content: Whatever... They don't get it.
attributes.name: Caper

attributes.content: But... I'm sure Pelirrojo and the guys over there loved the surprise.
attributes.name: Caper

attributes.content: A few days later...
Out of the way! Coming through!
attributes.name: Security Guard

attributes.content: Whoa, what a scene.
attributes.name: Caper

attributes.content: All these cars with flowers and balloons. Even their license plates are in order...
attributes.name: Caper

attributes.content: Suddenly, one of the cars leaves the motorcade and stops next to Caper.
The driver door swings open, and a familiar man steps out.
Carlie! There you are. Finally!
attributes.name: Pelirrojo

attributes.content: Where have you been the last couple days? Didn't even go to the casino, and that's your favorite hangout spot!
attributes.name: Pelirrojo

attributes.content: Hahaha...
attributes.name: Caper

attributes.content: What about you? You look pretty busy.
attributes.name: Caper

attributes.content: That's a nice ride you got there.
attributes.name: Caper

attributes.content: Uh, it's el jefe's car.
attributes.name: Pelirrojo

attributes.content: Oh, right. You didn't know. I joined the Snaptooths.
attributes.name: Pelirrojo

attributes.content: You see...
attributes.name: Pelirrojo

attributes.content: (Oh... So it's fireworks... They were fireworks!)
attributes.name: Pelirrojo

attributes.content: Oh no... I'm done for...
attributes.name: Pelirrojo

attributes.content: Are you done?
attributes.name: Snaptooth Boss

attributes.content: Ay, dios mío! Cariño, what an amazing fireworks show!
attributes.name: Surprised Girl

attributes.content: I didn't expect this at all. I thought you were starting another fight... but you had a surprise for me!
attributes.name: Surprised Girl

attributes.content: Hm? Oh... Yeah, that's right! I've been planning this for a long time!
attributes.name: Snaptooth Boss

attributes.content: And you helped me plan the whole thing, didn't you?
attributes.name: Snaptooth Boss

attributes.content: Huh? U-Uh, yeah...
attributes.name: Pelirrojo

attributes.content: Okay, sweetheart, hurry up and get changed. We're gonna have one hell of a dinner.
attributes.name: Snaptooth Boss

attributes.content: Wonderful! Thank you, cariño! I'm looking forward to it!
attributes.name: Surprised Girl

attributes.content: Um... Do you... still need me for anything else?
attributes.name: Pelirrojo

attributes.content: No, this was more than perfect.
attributes.name: Snaptooth Boss

attributes.content: Guess I had you all wrong.
attributes.name: Snaptooth Boss

attributes.content: Uh... No... sorry... I'll figure out a way to pay you back for the wall! I promise!
attributes.name: Pelirrojo

attributes.content: Pay me back?
attributes.name: Snaptooth Boss

attributes.content: You want to pay me back?
attributes.name: Snaptooth Boss

attributes.content: You took care of a huge problem for me. Why would I want you to pay me anything?
attributes.name: Snaptooth Boss

attributes.content: I've been worrying about when to propose to my girl, but looks like today's the day!
attributes.name: Snaptooth Boss

attributes.content: Somebody, book me a table at the restaurant with the best view in Dossoles!
attributes.name: Snaptooth Boss

attributes.content: Jefe! We got a call from the Sirus Rooftop Restaurant! They want to know if we're showing up for our reservation tonight!
attributes.name: Snaptooth Gofer

attributes.content: Huh? We already have a table booked? Your doing again?
attributes.name: Snaptooth Boss

attributes.content: Uh, maybe...?
attributes.name: Pelirrojo

attributes.content: Impressive, chico. I won't forget this.
attributes.name: Snaptooth Boss

attributes.content: Quick! Get the car! We're heading over now!
attributes.name: Snaptooth Boss

attributes.content: That night, the girl couldn't stop talking about the fireworks, then... el jefe proposed, and she said yes.
attributes.name: Pelirrojo

attributes.content: He was so happy, he inducted me right into the gang.
attributes.name: Pelirrojo

attributes.content: The wedding's tonight, and all these cars are heading there.
attributes.name: Pelirrojo

attributes.content: Oh, well that's a happy ending alright. Guess my plan was a success, huh?
attributes.name: Caper

attributes.content: Yeah, it couldn't have gone any better. I didn't expect you to come up with a crazy idea like that.
attributes.name: Pelirrojo

attributes.content: Hah, honestly, I was real nervous! If you were there, you probably could've heard my sweat hitting the floor!
attributes.name: Pelirrojo

attributes.content: But well, now that you're part of them, you can climb the ladder quick. Then, get the punks to stop their protection racket.
attributes.name: Caper

attributes.content: Uh... Let's not worry about that for now.
attributes.name: Pelirrojo

attributes.content: Hurry, get in! I'll take you! You can join the gang too!
attributes.name: Pelirrojo

attributes.content: Nah-ah, that sounds kinda lame.
attributes.name: Caper

attributes.content: Even if I did join, I'd just make trouble. Nobody's gonna like me there.
attributes.name: Caper

attributes.content: Besides, I'm leaving Dossoles.
attributes.name: Caper

attributes.content: Huh? Why?
attributes.name: Pelirrojo

attributes.content: Think about it, Carlie. If we both join the gang, we'll get to waltz right into the casinos, and no one would bother us at all!
attributes.name: Pelirrojo

attributes.content: What's wrong?
attributes.name: Pelirrojo

attributes.content: Isn't this the happy place you've been looking for?
attributes.name: Pelirrojo

attributes.content: Is it?
attributes.name: Caper

attributes.content: I don't think I can find the happiness I want here.
attributes.name: Caper

attributes.content: Suddenly, the balloons on the bridal cars are all released at once. They slowly take to the sky, floating upwards amid the children's cheers and the crowd's gaze.
By the time Pelirrojo looks back down, Caper is nowhere to be seen.
